alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 6:46AM MST until November 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 2 inches. Some snow showers could be intense with a quick 2 to 3 inch accumulation. * WHERE...Pullman, Moscow, Kamiah, Plummer, Winchester, Potlatch, Tekoa, Oakesdale, Soldiers Meadow Road, Nezperce, and Craigmont. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
